Item ID12802

Ward upgrade kit is an item which can be used on either the odium ward or malediction ward to create the odium ward (or) and malediction ward (or), respectively. The kit simply alters the ward's appearance, and is a purely cosmetic addition.

It can be purchased at Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 20 Last Man Standing points.

Upon using the upgrade kit, the upgraded ward becomes untradeable and the kit is consumed. The ward may be reverted to a tradeable version again by selecting the "revert" option. The upgrade kit will not be returned upon reverting the upgraded ward.

[[File:Ward upgrade kit detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Ward upgrade kit''' is an item which can be used on either the [[odium ward]] or [[malediction ward]] to create the [[odium ward (or)]] and [[malediction ward (or)]], respectively. The kit simply alters the ward's appearance, and is a purely cosmetic addition.

It can be purchased at [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 20 [[Last Man Standing]] points.

Upon using the upgrade kit, the upgraded ward becomes untradeable and the kit is consumed. The ward may be reverted to a tradeable version again by selecting the "revert" option. The upgrade kit '''will not''' be returned upon reverting the upgraded ward.
